title: David and Jonathan’s Covenant
summary: David and Jonathan reaffirm their covenant of friendship. Jonathan tests Saul’s intentions and confirms that Saul plans to kill David. They part in sorrow, and Jonathan pledges lifelong loyalty to David’s future house.

faq.question: How did Jonathan confirm Saul’s hatred for David?
faq.answer: By observing Saul’s reaction during the feast when David was absent—Saul even tried to kill Jonathan.

faq.question: What promise did Jonathan make to David?
faq.answer: To support him and protect his descendants, even after Jonathan’s own death.
